movie.title: Truth At Last: The Assassination of Martin Luther King
movie.plot: On April 4, 1967, Dr. Martin Luther King delivered a passionate speech at Riverside Church in New York staking out his opposition to the war in Vietnam. One year later to the day, he was ...

movie.title: King in the Wilderness
movie.plot: A chronicle of the final chapters of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.â€™s life, revealing a conflicted leader who faced an onslaught of criticism from both sides of the political spectrum.

movie.title: Talk to Me
movie.plot: The story of Washington D.C. radio personality Ralph "Petey" Greene, an ex-con who became a popular talk show host and community activist in the 1960s.
